OOC: I should mention that, unless otherwise noted, Empath's 
telepathic speech is directed to only one person at a time.  Even 
another telepath would have difficulty listening in.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Empath raises an eyebrow at the whole tirade.  "Must you boys 
always 
> fall for the new hot chick in town?" she inquires mildly, barely 
> sparing a glance for Starstorm.  The ex-Seeker looks to her 
master.  
> <Lord Galvatron,> she says telepathically, <Our avian cohort 
already 
> plots treason.  Personally, I couldn't care less about your 
reaction 
> to Stormy here.  Let her think I'm jealous if she wants.  It's only 
a 
> cover to make Cygnar think I'm looking in the wrong direction.>
>
